enhanced_by.reason: The validate method prepares a Calendar object which can be used as input for adjustToTimeZone.
Both methods operate on Calendar objects, making them suitable for setting up test scenarios.
The validate method can be used to prepare a Calendar object in a specific format and time zone, which is necessary before adjusting the time zone.
The compareWeeks method can be used to verify the state of the Calendar object after adjusting the time zone.
